ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: except for the companions of the Right.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Except those of the right hand
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: save the People of the Right Hand
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: except the people of the right hand
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Except those on the right side.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Except the people of the right hand,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: save the Companions of the Right;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Save those who will stand on the right hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: except those of the right hand
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Save the fellows of the right.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: except the People of the Right Hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Except the Companions of the Right Hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Except those on the Right, (i.e. the pious true believers of Islamic Monotheism);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: except the Companions of the Right.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Except for those on the Right.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Except the companions of the right,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [74:39] except those of the right [hand], namely, the believers who will be saved from it, and [who] will be,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Save these who will stand on the right hand) who are the dwellers of Paradise who are not the same.
